sql.if: and ( p.post_title like concat('%', #{search.keyword}, '%') or p.post_content like concat('%', #{search.keyword}, '%') or mp.profile_nickname like concat('%', #{search.keyword}, '%') )

mapper.insert: insert into tbl_funding (id, genre_type, investor_number, target_price, converge_price, file_content, funding_content, funding_status, thumbnail_file_id) values (#{id}, #{genreType}, #{investorNumber}, #{targetPrice}, #{convergePrice}, #{fileContent}, #{fundingContent}, '펀딩 중', #{thumbnailFileId})
insert into tbl_funding_product (product_name, product_price, product_amount, funding_id) values (#{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productAmount}, #{fundingId})
mapper.select:
select f.id, f.genre_type, f.target_price, f.converge_price, f.funding_status, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.member_profile_id, p.created_date, p.updated_date, mp.profile_nickname, m.profile_img_url as profileImgUrl, fl.file_name as thumbnail_file_name, fl.file_path as thumbnail_file_path, if(f.target_price > 0, round((f.converge_price / f.target_price) * 100, 1), 0) as funding_percentage from tbl_funding f join tbl_post p on f.id = p.id join tbl_member_profile mp on p.member_profile_id = mp.id join tbl_member m on mp.member_id = m.id left join tbl_file fl on f.thumbnail_file_id = fl.id where 1 = 1
group by f.id order by f.id desc limit #{pagination.startRow}, #{pagination.rowCount}

select f.id, f.genre_type, f.target_price, f.converge_price, f.funding_status, f.investor_number, f.funding_content, f.file_content, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.member_profile_id, p.created_date, p.updated_date, mp.profile_nickname, mp.profile_email, mp.profile_etc, m.profile_img_url as profileImgUrl, if(f.target_price > 0, round((f.converge_price / f.target_price) * 100, 1), 0) as funding_percentage, date_add(p.created_date, interval 1 month) as endDate from tbl_funding f join tbl_post p on f.id = p.id join tbl_member_profile mp on p.member_profile_id = mp.id join tbl_member m on mp.member_id = m.id where f.id = #{id}
select id, product_name, product_price, product_amount, funding_id from tbl_funding_product where funding_id = #{fundingId}
select f.id as fileId, f.file_name, f.file_path, f.file_size, f.file_type from tbl_post_file pf join tbl_file f on pf.file_id = f.id where pf.post_id = #{postId} order by pf.id
select count(*) from tbl_funding f join tbl_post p on f.id = p.id join tbl_member_profile mp on p.member_profile_id = mp.id where f.id is not null
mapper.update: update tbl_funding set funding_status = '펀딩 종료' where funding_status = '펀딩 중'
mapper.select: select f.id, f.genre_type, p.post_title, fl.file_name as thumbnailFileName, fl.file_path as thumbnailFilePath from tbl_funding f join tbl_post p on f.id = p.id left join tbl_file fl on f.thumbnail_file_id = fl.id where f.genre_type = #{genreType} and f.id != #{fundingId} order by p.created_date desc limit 5
mapper.update: update tbl_post set post_title = #{postTitle}, post_content = #{postContent}, updated_date = current_timestamp where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select f.id, f.investor_number, f.target_price, f.converge_price, f.file_content, f.funding_content, f.genre_type, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.member_profile_id, p.created_date, p.updated_date, fl.file_name as thumbnailFileName, fl.file_path as thumbnailFilePath, f.thumbnail_file_id as thumbnailFileId, mp.profile_nickname, m.profile_img_url as profileImgUrl from tbl_funding f join tbl_post p on f.id = p.id join tbl_member_profile mp on p.member_profile_id = mp.id join tbl_member m on mp.member_id = m.id left join tbl_file fl on f.thumbnail_file_id = fl.id where f.id = #{id}
